description: Creates an action for the environment, for example, creates a console link for an analytics tool that is available in this environment.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the environment action is created.

parameters.name: environmentIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the environment in which the environment action is created.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the environment action.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters of the environment action. awsConsoleLink (dict) --- The console link specified as part of the environment action. uri (string) --- The URI of the console link specified as part of the environment action.

nested_params.name: awsConsoleLink
nested_params.description: The console link specified as part of the environment action.

nested_params.name: uri
nested_params.description: The URI of the console link specified as part of the environment action.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the environment action.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain in which the environment action is created.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the environment in which the environment is created.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the environment action.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the environment action.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: The parameters of the environment action.

nested_items.name: awsConsoleLink
nested_items.description: The console link specified as part of the environment action.

nested_items.name: uri
nested_items.description: The URI of the console link specified as part of the environment action.
